text: 11:12 Jenesis 15:5; 22:17; 32:12; Godɨn Araziba 10:22; Rom 4:18-19Kamaghɨn, gumazir kam Abraham a ghurigha egha aremeghasava ami, egha an ovavir borir avɨribar afeziamɨn oto. Ezɨ an ovaviba otiva bar avɨraseme, mati overiamɨn mɨkoveziba, o ongarimɨn dadarimɨn gigiba. Gumazitam da mengɨva avegham.
